publishListing.q: How do I publish a listing?
publishListing.a: Create a free account, then click 'Publish a listing' and fill out the form.

verifiedListings.a: Yes, our team verifies each listing before publication to guarantee quality.

contactOwner.q: How do I contact an owner?
contactOwner.a: You can call them directly, send a message or contact via WhatsApp.

modifyListing.a: Yes, log in to your account and go to 'My listings' to modify it.

help.title: Help center
help.subtitle: Find answers to all your questions

publish.q: How do I publish a listing?
publish.a: To publish a listing, first create a free account. Then click 'Publish a listing', fill out the form with your property details (photos, description, price, location) and submit. Your listing will be verified by our team before publication.

cost.q: How much does it cost to publish a listing?
cost.a: Publishing listings on ImmoGuinee is completely free for individuals. Paid promotion options are available to increase your listing visibility.

modify.q: How do I modify or delete my listing?
modify.a: Log in to your account, go to 'My listings', select the listing and click 'Edit' or 'Delete'. Modifications will be re-verified before publication.

duration.q: How long does my listing stay online?
duration.a: Listings remain active for 60 days. You can renew them for free from your dashboard before expiration.

create.q: How do I create an account?
create.a: Click 'Sign up', enter your name, email and Guinean phone number. You will receive a verification code by SMS to activate your account.

forgotPassword.q: I forgot my password, what do I do?
forgotPassword.a: On the login page, click 'Forgot password'. Enter your phone number and follow the instructions to reset your password.

delete.q: How do I delete my account?
delete.a: Contact our support via the contact form or email at support@immoguinee.com. Deleting your account will delete all your listings.

scams.a: Never pay before visiting the property. Be wary of prices that are too low. Prefer listings with the 'Verified' badge. Always meet the owner in person before any payment.

report.q: How do I report a fraudulent listing?
report.a: On each listing, click the report icon. Describe the issue and our team will handle your report within 24 hours.

privacy.a: Yes, we use bank-level encryption. Your data is never shared with third parties without your consent.

methods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
methods.a: We accept Orange Money, MTN Mobile Money, bank transfers and credit card payments for premium options.

secure.a: For premium transactions, we offer an escrow service: money is held securely until the contract is signed and keys are handed over.

cta.title: Didn't find your answer?
cta.subtitle: Our support team is available to help you

home.title: ImmoGuinee - Real Estate Rental & Sale in Conakry, Guinea
home.description: Guinea's #1 real estate platform. Furnished apartments, villas, houses for rent in Conakry. Land for sale with title deed. Free listings in Kipe, Ratoma, Kaloum, Dixinn, Matam, Matoto.
home.h1: Find your ideal home in Guinea
home.contentIntro: ImmoGuinee is the leading real estate platform in Guinea. Whether you're looking for an apartment to rent in Kipe, a villa in Ratoma, or land for sale in Matoto, we have the listing you need.
home.contentServices: We offer long-term rentals, short-term furnished rentals for expats, and property sales with title deeds in all communes of Conakry.

search.title: Real Estate Search Conakry - Apartments, Houses, Land
search.description: Browse thousands of real estate listings in Guinea. Filter by neighborhood, property type, price. Rental and sale in Conakry.
search.noResultsHint: Try expanding your criteria or explore other neighborhoods in Conakry

shortTermRental.title: Short-Term Rental Conakry - Furnished Apartments
shortTermRental.description: Furnished short-term rentals in Conakry for expats, business travelers, tourists. Fully equipped apartments and villas in Kipe, Nongo, Taouyah.
shortTermRental.contentIntro: Short-term rental in Conakry is the ideal solution for expats, business travelers and tourists. Our furnished apartments offer comfort and flexibility.
shortTermRental.contentFeatures: WiFi included, 24/7 security, equipped kitchen, air conditioning, generator. Flexible booking from 1 day to several months.

publish.title: Post Free Real Estate Listing
publish.description: Post your real estate listing for free in Guinea. Rental or sale, reach thousands of potential buyers and tenants in Conakry.
publish.contentIntro: Post your real estate listing for free on ImmoGuinee. Whether you want to rent or sell, our platform connects you with thousands of potential clients in Guinea.
publish.stepType: Choose the property type and transaction
publish.stepDetails: Add details: title, description, price, features
publish.stepLocation: Indicate the exact location in Conakry

estimate.title: Free Property Valuation Conakry - Price per m2
estimate.description: Get a free property valuation in Conakry. Price per m2 by neighborhood, accurate estimates for rental and sale.
estimate.contentIntro: Our property valuation tool analyzes Conakry market prices to give you a reliable estimate of your property.
estimate.factors: Location (neighborhood, commune), area, property type, amenities (air conditioning, pool, generator), overall condition.

contact.title: Contact ImmoGuinee - Real Estate Support Conakry
contact.description: Contact the ImmoGuinee team for any questions about your listings, rental or sale in Guinea. Support via WhatsApp, email, phone.
